items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Display / LED Matrix

*   [micropython-wemos-led-matrix-shield (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/mattytrentini/micropython-wemos-led-matrix) - Driver for Wemos D1 Mini Matrix LED shield, using TM1640 chip.

### Sensors / Radiation

*   [micropython-geiger (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/Wangzhaotian725/micropython-geiger) - Geiger counter with MicroPython card.

### Tutorials / SRAM

*   [CoderDojo Twin Cities MicroPython (‚≠ê30)](https://github.com/CoderDojoTC/micropython) - Full coding curriculum for teaching MicroPython to children.

### Books / SRAM

*   [Python for Microcontrollers: Getting Started with MicroPython](https://www.mhprofessional.com/python-for-microcontrollers-getting-started-with-micropython-9781259644535-usa-group) - By Donald Norris. ISBN 9781259644535.

items.title: Awesome Firebase Genkit
items.content_text:
### Articles / Dart - Official

*   [Genkit in Node, Building a Weather Service with AI Integration](https://xavidop.me/firebase/gcp/2025-02-28-firebase-genkit-node-tool/) - Explore how to build a weather service using Genkit in Node.js using Express, GitHub Models and Tools.
items.content_html:
Articles / Dart - Official

  • Genkit in Node, Building a Weather Service with AI Integration - Explore how to build a weather service using Genkit in Node.js using Express, GitHub Models and Tools.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Internationalization / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [doloc](https://doloc.io/) - Instant translations in your [Angular](https://doloc.io/getting-started/frameworks/angular/) workflow.

### File Upload / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [filestack-angular (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/filestack/filestack-angular) - Integrate [Filestack](https://www.filestack.com/) into your Angular app for a faster, safer, and more reliable file upload experience.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / System Related Tools

*   [SteerMouse](https://plentycom.jp/en/steermouse/) - SteerMouse is a utility that lets you freely customize buttons, wheels and cursor speed. Both USB and Bluetooth mice are supported.
items.content_html:
Utilities / System Related Tools

  • SteerMouse - SteerMouse is a utility that lets you freely customize buttons, wheels and cursor speed. Both USB and Bluetooth mice are supported.
